flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to keep his total time at 300 or below because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
His total time spent in the other mazes is 20 because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=20>>20
His total time spent in the five mazes thus far is 65 because 20 + 45 = <<20+45=65>>65
He can spend 235 more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because 300 - 65 = <<300-65=235>>235
#### 235

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 20. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
